content: My favorite”Your job is not to build the features your users are asking for, it’s to ask the right questions that help you find the scalable solution — the solution that the majority of users will do.” As Steve Jobs said, people don’t know what they want until they see it. People think Steve Jobs said that because he had some magic power that can build products customer love. But it’s not. there is a very clear formula to build success product. And one of the core principles of this formula is to focus on customer’s problem/challenge/pain point. There is only one way to find out their problem/challenge/pain point — ask the right question. As a product manager, we should always remember, our product is not the center of users’ world, their problem is.
